Actions.Name: Converts a price from the source currency into the destination currency
Actions.Description: Automatically converts the price in the source currency into the destination currency using the latest available currency exchange rate data.

Actions.Name: Get a list of available currencies and corresponding countries
Actions.Description: Enumerates available currencies and the countries that correspond to these currencies.

Actions.Name: Gets the exchange rate from the source currency into the destination currency
Actions.Description: Automatically gets the exchange rate from the source currency into the destination currency using the latest available currency exchange rate data.
